title: Treatment coverage for depression in the general Spanish population and the impact of the Covid-19 pandemic
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Lea Francia, Riccardo De Giorgi, Elvira Lara, Blanca Dolz del Castellar, Chiara Castelletti, Cristina Rodríguez-Prada, Joan Domènech-Abella, Beatriz Olaya, Josep Maria Haro, José Luis Ayuso Mateos
